title: which is the best ad jungler
body:
* Pls give me ur opinion for the best ad jungler!
Tank u

replies.body: Shaco, critical for over 1.5k damage one hitting carries
Rengar, J4, Vi and Rek'Sai, they all really high damage in early but you might need to be able to control when to jump in and jump out in combat with them.
Id prefer rengar, unless they have a lee sin or quinn,  i guess .
kha is still god tier but pretty reliant on snowballing
